subject: Re: Cannot access public variable in testee class from test case
msgSnippet: Thanks for replying Simon. Actually my logger variable was being initialized in ejbCreate() and hence in my target method it was null. Thanks. ... variable
messageBody:
Thanks for replying Simon.

Actually my logger variable was being initialized in ejbCreate() and
hence in my target method it was null.

Thanks.
